revision.text:
{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = TL-WDN3200-01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = N600 Wireless Dual Band USB Adapter |caption2 = |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/home-networking/adapter/tl-wdn3200 |sp = |dl = http://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/?model=TL-WDN3200&version=V1#tbl_a |wikidevi = TP-LINK_TL-WDN3200 |wikipedia = |brand = TP-LINK |model = TL-WDN3200 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = v1 |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = May 13, 2012 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/TP-LINK_TL-WDN3200 |sernum = |wlclass = AN600 |series = |if = USB |if_bus_version = 2.0 |ifconnector = Male A |formfactor = dongle |vendor_id = 148f |device_id = 5572 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = TE7WDN3200 |icid = 8853A-WDN3200 |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = C4:6E:1F |chip1 = Ralink;RT5572; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = SWD |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = End of Life |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/02/2012 |estreldate = |price = |upc = 845973050665 |ean = 6935364050665 |asin = B007ZWL1ZE |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== There is only one ID in the driver (148f:5572 / USB\VID_148F&PID_5572). The device may (possibly) be known as the [http://www.tp-link.com.cn/pages/product-detail.asp?d=253 TL-WDN3321] in Asian markets. "1108012300-1.0" and "Rev:1.0sp1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. Indicated required USB power: 450 mA {{WiFiCert|WFA15926|07/12/2012}} On Product Version 1.2, Chip: Ralink RT5572N (datecode 1424), kernel 13.3: ==Pictures==
